concept.title: Install External Libraries
concept.shortdesc: Install external libraries to make them available to stages.

conbody.p: driversinstalling additional for stagesexternal librariesinstalling additional for stagesthird party librariesinstalling additional for stagesBefore you use the following stages, install JDBC drivers for the implementation that you want to use:
For example, to use the JDBC Query Consumer or the JDBC Producer with Oracle, install the Oracle JDBC drivers.
You can also install external Java libraries to call external Java code from the Groovy, Java, and Jython Evaluator processors.
You can install external libraries using the Package Manager in the user interface, or you can install them manually.
